page.title: 10TRANSPORT
page.content: In 1985 transport is very popular. There are lots of cars and busses. There are cars called Nissan and Ford but we never see a Rolls Royce. There are small cars and big cars and when cars get old they put them in the junk yard. There are sports cars which go very fast and now there are cars with computers in them. There are lots of bus stops like at "The Red Lion" and at Woodsend Circle. On a bus there are two floors. You pay the bus driver at the door and go and sit down. You get off when you get to your bus stop. I have a bike.I go out to places on my bike and visit my friend's house on it. We have a car called a Datsun Cherry.
